relevant_findings.general: No acute distress (NAD), alert and oriented x3.
relevant_findings.HEENT: Anicteric, PERRLA, EOMI, oral mucosa dry.
relevant_findings.neck: No JVD, no lymphadenopathy (LAD), no TM.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, non-tender (NT), non-distended (ND), positive bowel sounds (BS), incision well healed, no graft tenderness.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm and well perfused, no peripheral edema.
